capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have shaped his experiences and relationships at Hogwarts.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's definitely the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're a target for Lord Voldemort? It's no wonder he had such a tough time adjusting to fame after the whole ordeal with the Philosopher's Stone.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Petunia has a bit of a reputation going around. Apparently, she's always dishing out the latest gossip to anyone who will listen. I'm not sure if it's entirely true, but from what I've seen, Petunia does seem to know all the juicy details.
